verses.roman:
pavitra ha-inu mui pāinu daraśana
kṛtārtha ha-inu, mora saphala jīvana

synonyms: pavitra ha-inu—have become purified; mui—I; pāinu daraśana—have gotten your interview; kṛta-artha—obliged; ha-inu—I have become; mora—my; saphala—successful; jīvana—life.
translation: "Simply by seeing you, I have become purified. I am very obligated to you, for my life is now successful.
